channel.title: Rare items like bandos chest equip as a wepon
channel.description: Ok like, all armadyl armor, bandos, equip like as helms and weapons, i changed the "wield" to wear but still doesnt work...

item.title: Rare items like bandos chest equip as a wepon
item.dc:creator: @duhelis duhelis
item.description:
@duhelis wrote:

ok i know this…
go item.java

and put ur item ids there

all ur helms put in “public static int Helm”
and “public static int fullHelm”

you will understand so if you got body look for public static int body or platebody
and you got legs seach " public static in platelegs or legs"

Read full topic
item.source: Rare items like bandos chest equip as a wepon
